noPermission.description_limit_premium: You have reached the maximum number of Reaction Roles available in your plan. Upgrade to the Premium plan to unlock unlimited Roles!
noPermission.description_premium_feature: This feature is only available with the Premium plan. Upgrade your plan now to unlock it!
noPermission.description_embed: You do not have permission to use this command!
noPermission.description_embed_no_features: The feature is currently disabled. An administrator needs to enable it for it to be usable.
noPermission.description_embed_no_features_by_system: This feature is temporarily disabled for extraordinary maintenance. Please be patient: it will be available again shortly.

addCommand.description_embed: You have successfully set the reaction role for the role {0}. Now, when a user reacts to the message, the role will be assigned.
addCommand.description_embed_alreadyset: The reaction role you are trying to set already exists. There cannot be a reaction role with the same emoji.
addCommand.description_embed_missingpermissions: The role you are trying to set/remove is above the role {0}, which belongs to Alka. To set/remove it from the list, move Alka's role above the role you want to set.
addCommand.description_embed_channelnotfound: The message is not in the same channel where the interaction is taking place. Run the command in the channel where the message to which you want to set your reaction roles is located.
addCommand.description_embed_emojinotfound: The selected emoji was not found on your server. Please insert a valid emoji!

listCommand.description_embed: {0} Here is the list of Reaction Roles currently set.
listCommand.no_role: No reaction roles set yet, set them with /reactionrole.

removeCommand.description_embed: You have successfully removed the reaction role. It is no longer available.
removeCommand.description_embed_notset: The reaction role you are trying to remove does not exist in our database. Please try again.
removeCommand.description_embed_missingpermissions: The role you are trying to set/remove is above the role {0}, which belongs to Alka. To set/remove it from the list, move Alka's role above the role you want to set.
removeCommand.description_embed_channelnotfound: The message is not in the same channel where the interaction is taking place. Run the command in the channel where the message to which you want to remove your reaction roles is located.
removeCommand.description_embed_emojinotfound: The selected emoji was not found on your server. Please insert a valid emoji!
